channel.title: How do i make an auto ip banner for people who spam?
channel.description: just wondering, if anyone out there would be as of so kind to share with me, how to make my server automatically ip ban people who spam?

item.title: How do i make an auto ip banner for people who spam?
item.dc:creator: @kedonot1 kedonot1
item.description:
@kedonot1 wrote:

[quote=“deshawn82, post:5, topic:249765”][quote author=kedonot1 link=topic=329255.msg2574445#msg2574445 date=1228869401]
i have it,
but i told a mod to close it because of
DESHAWN and other noobs.
I anit gonna release it anymore, blame them.
[/quote]

You had nothing except what you leeched off google[/quote]
i didnt leech you noob,
Ok, go try finding it. Go find it, go.
And show me. Because i do my work.
And u cant create shit, thats why.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make an auto ip banner for people who spam?

search for anti syi

most people just look in my topic to tell me to fuck off and quit playing moparscape
